bug.short_desc: mock and its subpackages don't include __pycache__
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext: This is packaging bug and package should own __pycache__ directory and content inside (you probably will need to split files inside per subpackages)

True for mock-scm and mock-lvm, but for mock itself:
$ rpm -ql mock |grep __pycache__ /usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/mockbuild/__pycache__ /usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/mockbuild/__pycache__/__init__.cpython-35.opt-1.pyc /usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/mockbuild/__pycache__/__init__.cpython-35.pyc /usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/mockbuild/__pycache__/backend.cpython-35.opt-1.pyc /usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/mockbuild/__pycache__/backend.cpython-35.pyc /usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/mockbuild/__pycache__/buildroot.cpython-35.opt-1.pyc Note, this is package created from git head.
This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 26 development cycle. Changing version to '26'.
